subject: Tennis
China Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic improved his record at the China Open to 25-0 by beating Simone Bolelli. Rafael Nadal also advanced to the second round, beating the wild-card entry Wu Di.
snippet: Novak Djokovic improved his record at the China Open to 25-0 by beating Simone Bolelli. Rafael Nadal also advanced to the second round, beating the wild-card entry Wu Di.
